info.title: Contract Management API
info.description: The API used to manage PM contracts

put.description:
Change the organization, container, service, operation of a given contract in effect changing the management of contract scope. A usage example is as follows:

Request:

PUT /rest/contracts/9eaa8b14-10b5-11e5-93d5-eb4e298f7990:1042  HTTP/1.1
		{
		    "ResourceSetInfo": {
		      "ResourceSetName": "My Resourceset",
		      "Description": "My Resourceset"
		    },
		    "OrganizationKey":[ "uddi:f005b0b2-1079-11e5-a330-a83ecc4e96f2"],
		    "ContainerKey": ["nd3845"],
		    "ServiceKey": ["uddi:a06434c0-1122-11e5-93d5-eb4e298f7990"],
		    "OperationKey": ["a2328c24-1122-11e5-93d5-eb4e298f7990"],
		    "ContractKey": ["9eaa8b14-10b5-11e5-93d5-eb4e298f7990:1042"]
		}

Response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

delete.description:
Remove the contract with given key. A typical request/response look like the following

Request:

DELETE /rest/contracts/dfde5141-10b2-11e5-93d5-eb4e298f7990:1041 HTTP/1.1

Response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

Request:

GET /rest/contracts/d92830eb-1125-11e5-93d5-eb4e298f7990:1043?includepolicy=true HTTP/1.1

Response:

		{
		   "ContractInfo":    {
		      "Description": "",

		      "EffectiveDateTimes":       {
		         "StartDateTime":          {
		            "DateTime": "2015-06-12T10:09:00-07:00",
		            "TimezoneName": "America/Los_Angeles"
		         },
		         "EndDateTime":          {
		            "DateTime": "2016-06-11T10:09:00-07:00",
		            "TimezoneName": "America/Los_Angeles"
		         },
		         "Expire": false
		      },
		      "ContractVersionInfo":       {
		         "LastModifiedTimestamp": "2015-06-12",
		         "User": "Local Domain\a",

post.description:
Creates a contract in the given organization with given parameters. A usage example is as follows:

Request :

POST /rest/contracts HTTP/1.1
 {
    "ContractInfo": {
      "Name": "CreatedContract1",
      "Anonymous": "true",
      "State": "Active",
      "Description": "Created Contract1",
      "ProviderOrganizationKey": "uddi:f005b0b2-1079-11e5-a330-a83ecc4e96f2",
      "EffectiveDateTimes": {
        "StartDateTime": {
          "DateTime": "2015-04-23T22:36:00-07:00",
          "TimezoneName": "America/Los_Angeles"
        },
        "EndDateTime": {
          "DateTime": "2016-04-22T22:36:00-07:00",
          "TimezoneName": "America/Los_Angeles"
        },
        "Expire": "false"
      }
    },
    "AddContractContext": {
      "Action": "@CreateOffer",
      "Comments": "My Comments"
    }
 }

Response:

HTTP/1.1 201 Created

get.summary: Returns contracts for the given criteria.
get.description:

Request:

GET /rest/contracts?providerOrg=uddi:f005b0b2-1079-11e5-a330-a83ecc4e96f2  HTTP/1.1

Response:

		{"ContractInfo": [{
		   "Description": "Created Contract5",

		   "EffectiveDateTimes":    {

		         "DateTime": "2015-04-23T22:36:00-07:00",
		         "TimezoneName": "America/Los_Angeles"
		      },
		      "Expire": false
		   },
		   "ContractVersionInfo":    {
		      "MetadataVersion": 1,

parameters.name: providerService
parameters.description: Return all contracts that govern the given provider's service key

parameters.name: providerOrg
parameters.description: Return all contracts that govern the given provider's organization key

parameters.name: consumerOrg
parameters.description: Return all contracts that govern the given consumer's organization key

put.description:
Performs a workflow action on the contract with the given key. The available workflow actions are based on the current workflow process in use for contracts in the system. A usage example is as follows:

Request:
PUT /rest/contracts/d92830eb-1125-11e5-93d5-eb4e298f7990:1043/workflow HTTP/1.1
{
"Action" : "Activate Contract",
"Comment" : "Putting contract into production.",
"UserName" : "jdoe"
}

Response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the contract to perform the action on.
